text: @SenSchumer @AlyssaM87695643 Trump lies every time he tweets or opens his mouth.  He has gutted the federal government.  He is a sociopathic narcissist authoritarian wannabe who has zero ability to care for anyone other than himself and zero ability to lead in a crisis.  #COVID19 #COVID
